response: He was pretty upset with himself, so he looked down at the water under the bridge to avoid eye contact. But even that didn't work, since he could still see the guys' fancy hats and collared shirts reflected in the water. They were all dressed in pretty standard clerical attire. He muttered "Hickey" under his breath.
